subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: James got help from Kyrie Irving, who scored 27 of his 32 points in the second half, and Kevin Love, who added 22 points, in a victory over the Pelicans.
snippet: James got help from Kyrie Irving, who scored 27 of his 32 points in the second half, and Kevin Love, who added 22 points, in a victory over the Pelicans.
